properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1 v9 c1 v10 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa nee swaramu jalamulapai vinabadenu Mahima gala devudu urumuvale garjhinchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Balamaina nee swaramu bahu prabhaavamu galadi devadaarula virachunu prajvalimpa cheyunagnini{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Adbutha prabhu swaramu aranyamu kadilinchunu aakula raalajeyunu lella neena jeyunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aalayamandanniyu aayanane ghana parachun aasheervadamu shaanthi nosagu naayana swarame{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee madhura swaramu nee vaakyamuna vindun praaradhanala yanduna pratidinamu palkedavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee madhura swaramu nee chittamu thelpunu anudina jeevitamulo anusarincheda ninnu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee madhura swaramu nee maargamu joopunu kudi yedamala thirigina nee swarame vinabadunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thuphaanulu kaligi bhaya bheethulalo nunda bhaya padaku manipalike premagala nee swaram{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maranaandhakaara loyalo nenunda neeku thodai yunti nanedi swaramunu vintin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvaa selavimmu nee daasu daalinchun deenudanai nee maata angeekarinchedanu{/lang-eng}
